term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - imbibition in colloid chemistry
term.title: imbibition

item.text: The uptake of a liquid by a gel or porous substance. It may or may not be accompanied by swelling.

sources.item: PAC, 1972, 31, 577. 'Manual of Symbols and Terminology for Physicochemical Quantities and Units, Appendix II: Definitions, Terminology and Symbols in Colloid and Surface Chemistry' on page 615 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac197231040577)
